mutants.code:
def min_subset(arr, n):
    arr = sorted(arr)
    total_sum = sum(arr)
    i = n + 1
    current_sum = 0
    while i > -1 and current_sum <= total_sum / 2:
        current_sum += arr[i]
        i -= 1
    return n - i - 1
